body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

The package is installed by
```
spack find -dl paraview@5.10.0-RC1+mpi+python3+osmesa+cuda+hdf5^llvm@11.1.0%gcc@8.5.0
```

Then I start on the server with
```
pvserver
```

The logs in the server is 
```
z2yang@AMAs3:~$ pvserver
Waiting for client...
Connection URL: cs://AMAs3:11111
Accepting connection(s): AMAs3:11111
Client connected.
(  78.988s) [pvserver        ] vtkPVSessionServer.cxx:662    ERR| vtkPVSessionServer (0x541dfa0): Could not create information object: `vtkPVRenderingCapabilitiesInformation`.

```

And the error in the client is
```
ERROR: In C:\glr\builds\paraview\paraview-ci\build\superbuild\paraview\src\Remoting\ServerManager\vtkSIProxyDefinitionManager.cxx, line 531
vtkSIProxyDefinitionManager (000002A074800E30): No proxy that matches: group=writers and proxy=PPLYWriter were found.

ERROR: In C:\glr\builds\paraview\paraview-ci\build\superbuild\paraview\src\Remoting\ServerManager\vtkSMProxy.cxx, line 1704
vtkSMDataExtractWriterProxy (000002A008A8A550): Failed to create subproxy: PPLYWriter

ERROR: In C:\glr\builds\paraview\paraview-ci\build\superbuild\paraview\src\Remoting\ServerManager\vtkSIProxyDefinitionManager.cxx, line 531
vtkSIProxyDefinitionManager (000002A074800E30): No proxy that matches: group=writers and proxy=PPLYWriter were found.

ERROR: In C:\glr\builds\paraview\paraview-ci\build\superbuild\paraview\src\Remoting\ServerManager\vtkSMProxy.cxx, line 1704
vtkSMDataExtractWriterProxy (000002A016F79E20): Failed to create subproxy: PPLYWriter

ERROR: In /tmp/z2yang/spack-stage/spack-stage-paraview-5.10.0-RC1-65vmm425q4txoezdh2xabbmx6i2yt2l2/spack-src/Remoting/ServerManager/vtkPVSessionServer.cxx, line 662
vtkPVSessionServer (0x541dfa0): Could not create information object: `vtkPVRenderingCapabilitiesInformation`.

ERROR: In C:\glr\builds\paraview\paraview-ci\build\superbuild\paraview\src\Remoting\ServerManager\vtkSMSessionClient.cxx, line 794
vtkSMSessionClient (000002A026B8FA90): Server failed to gather information.

ERROR: In C:\glr\builds\paraview\paraview-ci\build\superbuild\paraview\src\Remoting\ServerManager\vtkSIProxyDefinitionManager.cxx, line 531
vtkSIProxyDefinitionManager (000002A074800E30): No proxy that matches: group=views and proxy=RenderView were found.

debug: In unknown, line 0
debug: Failed to create a proxy for the requested view type: "RenderView"
```

Could some give me some hints to solve this problem? Thanks!

@chuckatkins  @danlipsa  @vicentebolea

The dependency of the package is 
```
-- linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell / gcc@8.5.0 ----------------------

eqd6uc6     bzip2@1.0.8
```

### Information on your system

```
z2yang@AMAs3:~$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.3-5279-e93a2db8b7
* **Python:** 3.8.10
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell
* **Concretizer:** clingo
```

### Additional information

Because there is no build error, so these files are omitted.

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: paraview@paraview@5.10.0-RC1 (runtime error)
